scripts.serve: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next dev
scripts.start: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next start
scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next build
scripts.export: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf build/ && next build && next export -o nihilncunia.github.io/ && touch nihilncunia.github.io/.nojekyll && cd ../nihilncunia.github.io && mv .git ../backup && cd ../ && rm -rf nihilncunia.github.io && cd nihilncunia-code && mv nihilncunia.github.io ../ && cd ../backup && mv .git ../nihilncunia.github.io && cd ../nihilncunia.github.io && git config core.autocrlf true && git add .
